original_text: When they had gone a distance from the home of Micah, the men who were in the houses near Micah's house were called out, and they overtook the people of Dan.
korean_text: 그들이 미가의 집을 멀리 떠난 때에 미가의 이웃집 사람들이 모여서 단 자손을 따라 붙어서

sentences.original_text: When they had gone a distance from the home of Micah,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 미가의 집에서 어느 정도 거리를 갔을 때,

sentences.original_text: the men who were in the houses near Micah's house
sentences.korean_translation: 미가의 집 근처 집들에 있던 남자들이

sentences.original_text: and they overtook the people of Dan.
